alert.note: Alert for Coastal McIntosh; Inland McIntosh; Long (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:07PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF MCINTOSH AND LONG COUNTIES... At 407 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Everett, or 14 miles west of Darien, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Darien, Tibet, Jones, Wolf Island, Eulonia, Valona, Little Saint Simons Island and South Newport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
